Data: Maxwell to Bell, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Maxwell to Ali, no run loopy outside off. Moeen's bottom hand takes over as he goes for the drive, and he hits it hard back to the bowler
Maxwell to Ali, no run some air once again, and Moeen goes for the sweep and misses. Goes with the angle and he's lucky that missed his off stump
Maxwell to Ali, 1 run length ball on off stump and he comes forward and steers it through cover point
Maxwell to Bell, FOUR runs tossed up, angling across towards off stump, and Bell quickly gets into position for the reverse-sweep, beats the diving fielder at short third man
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run tossed up on middle stump, clipped down to long-on
Sandhu to Bell, 1 run back of a length just outside off, and Bell helps himself to another dabbed single to third man
Sandhu to Ali, no run back of a length on middle stump, pushed back to the bowler with a roll of the wrists
Sandhu to Ali, no run fullish on middle and off, driven to mid-off
Sandhu to Ali, 1 run full on leg stump, whipped away to deep midwicket
Sandhu to Bell, 1 run back of a length, angling in towards middle stump. Bell shuffles across and clips it towards deep backward square leg
Sandhu to Ali, no run length ball on middle stump, clipped to short midwicket
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run length ball angling across towards middle stump. No turn, and Bell stays in his crease and works it away to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Ali, no run nice loop, angled in towards off stump. Moeen comes forward to defend, it dips on him, goes with the angle, and off the inside half of the bat into the on side
Maxwell to Ali, 1 run this time he comes forward and gets to the pitch, pushes it wide of the man at short cover

Maxwell to Bell, 1 bye what happened there? Went for the reverse-sweep again, but it was too full for that. Goes with the angle, misses his pads, narrowly misses off stump, and bounces off the keeper's gloves into the leg side
Maxwell to Ali, 1 run on the pads, worked through midwicket
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run length ball angling across. Bell shuffles across and works it from outside off through square leg
Faulkner to Bell, no run length ball outside off, punched to short cover
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run full on middle and off, driven down to long-off to bring up his half-century
Faulkner to Ali, 1 run good ball, a tiny bit of shape away from the left-hander from outside off. He goes for the cover drive without moving his feet, and edges it down to third man
Faulkner to Bell, no run slower ball, full on middle stump. Bell defends into the on side
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run yorker on middle stump. Bell gets his feet out of the way and pokes it away to sweeper cover
Faulkner to Ali, no run full on middle stump, clipped to mid-on
Maxwell to Bell, no run on the pads, clipped to short midwicket
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run down the track, Maxwell shortens his length a touch, and Bell pushes it down the ground to long-on
Maxwell to Ali, 1 run back of a length on middle stump. Moeen moves his front leg out of the way and punches it down to long-on
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run shortish, and Bell takes a big step back and across and pulls towards deep square leg
Maxwell to Ali, FOUR runs short, down the leg side, and Moeen swivels around and gets just enough bat on it to help it wide of Sandhu at short fine leg
Maxwell to Ali, FOUR runs tossed up wide outside off, and Moeen welcomes the swinging room, gets down on one knee and swipes it away to the straight midwicket boundary
Faulkner to Bell, 2 runs slower ball on a good length outside off. Bell chips it quite deliberately, in the air, into the gap between long-off and sweeper cover
Faulkner to Bell, 2 runs full and wide again, another checked drive in the air, bounces down to the left of long-off
Faulkner to Bell, 2 runs very full outside off, and Bell uses his hands adroitly to manoeuvre (correct my spelling if that's wrong) it to the left of sweeper cover
Faulkner to Bell, no run slower ball, back of a length and angling across. Bell looks to steer it square on the off side, can't connect
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run full on middle stump, driven down to long-off

Faulkner to Ali, no run excellent delivery, on a fullish but not driving length outside off. Moeen pushes at it, his hands going at the ball and his feet following a fortnight later, and his bat swishes at thin air
Henriques to Bell, no run length ball on off stump. Bell defends with the angle towards short midwicket
Henriques to Bell, 1 run shortish outside off, pulled away to deep midwicket
Henriques to Ali, 1 run full on off stump, driven firmly down the ground but mid-off dives to his left to stop it. Finch, I think.
Henriques to Bell, 2 runs full on middle and off, Bell gets his front foot out of the way and pushes it to the right of the fielder at sweeper cover
Henriques to Bell, no run full again, good-looking drive but he can't beat the alert Smith at short cover
Henriques to Bell, 2 runs on the pads and he clips it away towards deep backward square leg
Faulkner to Ali, no run
Faulkner to Ali, 1 run back of a length on off stump. Moeen shuffles across and works it with the angle to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run slower ball on middle and off. Bell gets on his toes and clips it towards square leg

Faulkner to Ali, OUT gone. Moeen runs down the track, and Faulkner bowls a shortish slower ball. He swings across the line, and the extra bounce forces him to top-edge it high in the air, and the man at short cover settles comfortably under it
Faulkner to Taylor, no run fullish outside off, and he comes forward to push it to short cover
Faulkner to Taylor, no run back of a length on a fourth-stump line, poked away to backward point
Henriques to Bell, 2 runs fullish on leg stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
Henriques to Bell, no run length ball a short distance outside off, left alone
Henriques to Bell, 1 run slower ball on off stump. Bell comes forward and pushes it to long-on. Was in the air for a bit but always a safe shot
Henriques to Taylor, no run back of a length outside off, beats Taylor as he plays a weird-looking attempted dab to third man
Henriques to Taylor, no run back of a length, angling in towards middle stump. Looks to work it leg side with an angled bat, gets a leading edge into the off side
Henriques to Taylor, no run back of a length outside off, dabbed to the left of point, where Smith makes a good diving save
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, and Bell Bells it to third man
Faulkner to Taylor, no run fullish outside off and he moves into a confident-looking drive that is intercepted by short cover
Faulkner to Taylor, no run length ball on middle stump, pushed to mid-on
Faulkner to Taylor, no run back of a length on off stump, poked away to cover point
Faulkner to Taylor, 1 run back of a length, a bit of width, and he cuts it away to the right of third man
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run shortish and wide, Bell goes for the cut and gets a thick outside edge down to third man
Henriques to Bell, 1 run full on off stump, driven past the stumps at the other end, down to long-on
Henriques to Taylor, 1 run shortish, pulled down to deep backward square leg
Henriques to Bell, no run back of a length on middle stump, defended into the on side
Henriques to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, steered down to third man
Henriques to Taylor, 1 run shortish, a bit of extra bounce on a fourth-stump line. Gets a little big on Taylor, but he manages to control the cut and play it down to third man
Henriques to Bell, no run length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Faulkner to Taylor, 1 run slower ball on leg stump, pushed to mid-on for a quick single
Faulkner to Bell, FOUR runs full outside off, and Bell clears his front leg and swipes it over mid-on. Didn't quite middle it but the placement was pretty good
Faulkner to Bell, no run back of a length outside off, can't beat point with that open-faced steer
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run in the blockhole on middle stump, low full-toss, in fact. Pushed down the ground to long-off
Faulkner to Taylor, 1 run back of a length on off stump, and Taylor dabs it away to third man
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run full on middle stump, driven to long-off
Henriques to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, and Bell picks up another single down to third man

Henriques to Taylor, OUT gone! That was full on off stump, and Taylor goes for the drive over extra cover, he's too close to the pitch of the ball and ends up toe-ending it and hitting it in the air, straight to mid-off
Henriques to Root, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump. Root gets on the front foot to defend towards short cover
Henriques to Root, no run full outside off, driven to mid-off
Henriques to Root, 2 runs full again, wider outside off this time, Root opens his bat face to slice the drive towards third man
Henriques to Root, 1 run back of a length angling in towards middle stump. Root shuffles across and tucks it into the leg side
Faulkner to Root, 1 run back of a length outside off, and Root gets an opportunity to show off his version of the dab to third man

Faulkner to Bell, 1 run was that a drop? Bell goes for the cut, and it's too close to him for that, and Haddin dives across to his right to catch the ball that is going downwards after hitting the toe-end of the bat, can't quite hold on with his right glove
Faulkner to Root, no run fuller now, on middle stump, punched back to the bowler
Faulkner to Root, 1 run full on middle stump, clipped away towards deep midwicket
Faulkner to Bell, 1 wide slower ball, very wide, hits the wide line on the full and Bell has no option but to leave
Faulkner to Bell, 2 runs another slower ball, closer to the batsman this time, and he plays a chipped drive over the covers
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run length ball, angling towards off stump. Bell lets it come on and pokes it away towards point
Henriques to Bell, FOUR runs shot. That's full outside off, and Bell drives on the up, in the air, but well over the diving fielder at short cover
Henriques to Bell, no run back of a length on off stump, dabbed to backward point
Henriques to Bell, no run in the blockhole outside off, dug out towards short midwicket
Henriques to Bell, FOUR runs on the pads now, and Bell executes the leg glance brilliantly, placing it into the gap to the right of short fine leg
Henriques to Bell, no run full and wide, driven to mid-off
Henriques to Bell, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump, blocked to short cover
Starc to Root, no run back of a length outside off, looks for the dab to third man but can't beat point, moving quickly to his left
Starc to Root, no run length ball on a fourth-stump line, defended to short cover
Starc to Root, 1 run full and wide, driven elegantly to the right of sweeper cover
Starc to Bell, 1 run width again, not quite driving length this time, and Bell reaches out to ease it to sweeper cover
Starc to Root, 1 run short now, Root pulls to deep midwicket
Starc to Bell, no run full on off stump, driven to point with an open face
Sandhu to Root, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump. Root lets it come on and dabs it to short third man
Sandhu to Root, no run back of a length on off stump, no real room to work with and he punches it to point

Sandhu to Root, FOUR runs length ball, gives him a bit of width this time, and Root gets down on his knees to manufacture the height to cut, and he ends up halfway steering it, halfway edging it to the fine third man boundary
Sandhu to Root, no run fuller now, closer to off stump, and he gets forward to drive to short cover
Sandhu to Root, 1 run full on off stump, whipped away to deep square leg
Sandhu to Bell, 3 runs short outside off, pulled away to the left of deep square leg, who sprints to his left, slides, and pushes the ball to the approaching long-on fielder
Starc to Bell, 1 run full outside off, driven to deep point
Starc to Root, 1 run full and wide once more, driven to that deep point fielder again
Starc to Bell, no run uppish, and that just about doesn't carry. It's not quite pitched up enough for the drive, and Bell drives uppishly, but it bounces short of Smith at short cover
Starc to Bell, 1 run full on off stump, controlled drive to the right of deep point
Starc to Root, FOUR runs short ball over leg stump, and Root shuffles across and swivels to help it down to the fine leg boundary
Starc to Root, 1 run length ball wide outside off. Root gets a good stride out to drive that to sweeper cover
Sandhu to Root, no run back of a length on middle stump, tucked away to short midwicket
Sandhu to Root, no run length ball outside off, and he opens his bat face but can't steer it past Maxwell at short third man
Sandhu to Root, 1 run full on middle and leg, clipped away to deep backward square leg
Sandhu to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man
Sandhu to Root, no run length ball outside off, and he comes forward and pushes it to point
Sandhu to Root, 1 run back of a length outside off, cut away to third man
Henriques to Root, no run full outside off, driven to short cover
Henriques to Root, 2 runs full on off stump, angling in. Root gets his front foot across and clips it towards deep midwicket
Henriques to Root, 1 run full on off stump, driven to mid-on
Henriques to Bell, no run back of a length on off stump, dabbed to point
Henriques to Bell, no run length ball outside off, steered to point
Henriques to Bell, no run length ball on off stump. Bell shuffles across and pushes it back to the bowler
Cummins to Root, no run back of a length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Cummins to Root, no run length ball outside off, a bit of extra bounce, beats Root, who leans back and looks to slash
Cummins to Root, 1 run on the pads, flicked to deep square leg
Cummins to Bell, 1 run shortish, and Bell shuffles across and half-tucks, half-pulls it down to deep square leg to bring up his fourth ODI hundred. Well played!
Cummins to Root, no run back of a length on off stump and he gets on his toes to push it towards point
Cummins to Root, no run full outside off, drives firmly but can't beat Smith at short cover
Henriques to Bell, 1 run slower ball on off stump. Bell initially shapes to drive, and then waits an age before dabbing it down to third man
Henriques to Root, 1 run angles this into middle stump, and Root steps across to clip it to deep midwicket
Henriques to Bell, no run very full on middle and leg. Bell looks to flick it over the leg side, ends up inside-edging into his pads
Henriques to Bell, 1 run slower ball on off stump, clipped towards mid-on
Henriques to Root, 2 runs length ball on off stump, clipped with the angle towards deep backward square leg
Henriques to Root, 1 run low full-toss outside off, pushed down to long-on
Cummins to Root, 1 run length ball outside off, Root comes forward to steer it to third man
Cummins to Bell, FOUR runs short outside off, gives Bell enough width to play the square cut, splits the gap between point and third man. Super shot
Cummins to Bell, 1 run even more width this time, works to the bowler's advantage since it forces Bell to cut that in front of square, where they have sweeper cover patrolling the boundary
Cummins to Root, no run back of a length on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
Cummins to Root, no run length ball outside off, Root looks for that front-foot steer again, can't beat Maxwell at backward point
Cummins to Root, 1 run back of a length on off stump, dabbed down to Sandhu at third man
Starc to Root, FOUR runs length ball outside off, and Root comes forward to drive, gets a thick edge that beats third man diving to his left on the boundary
Starc to Root, 1 run back of a length outside off, steered to third man with an open face
Starc to Bell, 1 run length ball outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
Starc to Root, FOUR runs on the pads, and Root shuffles across and flicks it away to the backward square leg boundary. Poor ball with fine leg inside the circle
Starc to Root, 1 run length ball outside off, steered away for another single to third man
Starc to Bell, no run full and wide, Bell reaches out and slices it to point
Sandhu to Root, no run back of a length on off stump, dabbed away to the left of backward point
Sandhu to Root, 1 run shortish, pulled away to the left of deep backward square leg
Sandhu to Bell, 1 run length ball on middle stump, tucked away to deep backward square leg
Sandhu to Root, 1 run length ball, angling in towards middle and off, worked away to the right of mid-on
Sandhu to Bell, 1 leg bye slower ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
Sandhu to Root, no run full-toss on off stump, whipped to short midwicket
Starc to Bell, 1 run back of a length, tucked off the hips towards square leg
Starc to Root, 2 runs full outside off, driven towards deep point
Starc to Root, 1 run length ball, angling in towards off stump, whipped away towards long-on
Starc to Bell, no run in the blockhole, just outside off, a bit of late swing away too. Bell looks to jam his bat down on it, ends up playing down the wrong line
Starc to Bell, 2 runs full-toss outside off, sliced over the covers
Starc to Bell, no run fullish on leg stump. Bell makes room and pokes it away towards point
Sandhu to Root, 1 run shortish slower ball, pulled away to deep square leg
Sandhu to Bell, FOUR runs short again, pulled again, and this time he hits it well in front of square and finds the gap to the left of the fielder on the leg-side boundary
Sandhu to Bell, 1 run another short ball, pulled to deep square leg
Sandhu to Root, 1 run in the blockhole on leg stump, clipped away to deep backward square leg
Sandhu to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, chopped away towards deep point
Sandhu to Root, no run back of a length, Root shuffles across and whips it from outside off to short midwicket
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run length ball on off stump. Bell makes room to slap it to sweeper cover
Faulkner to Root, 1 run fullish on off stump, whipped away to the left of short midwicket
Faulkner to Bell, no run slower ball outside off. Bell clears his front leg, attempts the slog-sweep, can't connect
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run back of a length on off stump, Bell makes room to cut, it doesn't quite come on, and he can't beat short cover
Faulkner to Root, 1 leg bye lbw appeal as Root shuffles across to flick, they take a leg bye as it runs away into the leg side. Pitched outside leg for sure
Faulkner to Bell, FOUR runs makes room again, and this time he manages to cut it away from a middle-stump line and beat the diving fielder at short third man
Cummins to Root, 1 run back of a length on off stump. Root walks across and whips it away towards deep square leg
Cummins to Bell, FOUR runs length ball on off stump, Bell clears his front leg and smacks that over mid-off. Excellent shot, pretty poor ball in the circumstances
Cummins to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed away to third man
Cummins to Root, 2 runs fullish on the pads, clipped away towards deep square leg, and he takes two to complete his half-century
Cummins to Root, 1 run full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Cummins to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, and the Bell dab to third man makes another appearance
Faulkner to Bell, no run fullish slower ball on off stump, checked drive to mid-off
Faulkner to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, steered towards sweeper cover
Faulkner to Root, 1 run shortish slower ball outside off. Root shuffles across to pull it to deep square leg
Faulkner to Bell, no run down the track, making himself room. Faulkner sees Bell coming and slides the slower ball wide outside off. Bell goes for the big hit over cover, can't connect
Faulkner to Bell, 3 runs back of a length outside off and Bell slashes it over backward point. Henriques sprints around from sweeper cover and cuts it off on the slide
Faulkner to Root, 2 runs down the track again, whipped away from middle stump towards deep midwicket
Cummins to Bell, SIX runs short, Bell goes for the pull from wide outside off, top-edges it but it still carries all the way over the ropes and into the stands behind the square leg boundary
Cummins to Bell, 1 run back of a length outside off, steered to third man
Cummins to Root, 1 run length ball outside off, steered to third man
Cummins to Bell, no run length ball on off stump, Root looks to make room to punch through the off side, it doesn't quite come on and he ends up hitting it straight to mid-off
Cummins to Bell, no run short again, angling in, a bit of extra bounce to beat Bell's attempted pull
Cummins to Bell, no run in the blockhole outside off. Bell opens his bat face to steer it but can't beat Maxwell at backward point
Sandhu to Root, 1 run shortish on off stump, pulled away towards deep square leg

Sandhu to Bell, OUT that is that. The slower ball ends Bell's innings. He comes down the track, Sandhu bowls it shorter, and he goes through with the attempted flat-bat smack over mid-off. Hits high on the bat, and it loops to the left of mid-off, from where Starc manages to backtrack and dive to his left to take a smart catch
Sandhu to Root, 1 run fullish on off stump, clipped away towards deep midwicket
Sandhu to Morgan, OUT got him first ball! That was back of a length, angling across, and Morgan feels for it outside off, looking to run it down to third man, and gets a thin edge through to Haddin
Sandhu to Buttler, no run back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Sandhu to Buttler, no run back of a length outside off, punched to short cover
Cummins to Root, 1 run length ball outside off, whipped away towards long-on
Cummins to Buttler, no run back of a length on a fifth-stump line, left alone
Cummins to Buttler, no run back of a length on off stump, dabbed towards point
Cummins to Buttler, 1 run on the pads, clipped away towards deep midwicket
Cummins to Root, FOUR runs low full-toss on off stump and Root walks across his stumps to scoop that over short fine leg. Top shot
Cummins to Root, no run back of a length on off stump, shuffles across and tucks it to short midwicket
Sandhu to Buttler, 1 run slower ball outside off, driven to sweeper cover

Sandhu to Root, no run in the blockhole on middle stump. Root jams his bat down on it and it bounces up towards the bowler and he does well to stick his right hand out and stop it in his follow-through
Sandhu to Root, 1 run shortish slower ball, pulled away to deep midwicket
Sandhu to Buttler, FOUR runs length ball outside off. Buttler throws his bat at it and gets a thick outside edge that runs away to the third man boundary
Sandhu to Buttler, 1 run tails into the blockhole on middle stump. Buttler swipes it away towards deep backward square leg
Sandhu to Root, FOUR runs shot! Length ball outside off, and Root knows third man is in the circle and immediately gets in position to reverse-slap it powerfully to the left of that fielder
Cummins to Buttler, 1 run shortish outside off. Buttler counter-productively made room, and ended up having to reach across a long way to slap it to sweeper cover
Cummins to Root, 1 wide slower bouncer, Root leans back, looks for the ramp, it's too high for him to connect
Cummins to Root, 1 run low full-toss, following Root who made room outside leg, and he clips it away towards short midwicket
Cummins to Buttler, 1 run back of a length on leg stump, follows Buttler, who can only dab it away towards point

Cummins to Root, OUT gone! That's a length ball outside off, it was there to be hit, but Root, clearing his front leg, couldn't get any elevation on it, and he ended up popping it straight into mid-on's hands
Cummins to Bopara, no run length ball outside off, dabbed to backward point
Cummins to Bopara, 1 run fullish on middle and off, clipped towards mid-on to get off the mark
Starc to Bopara, no run length ball angling across towards off stump, defended back to the bowler
Starc to Bopara, no run down the track, and he bowls it into the newly created blockhole outside off. Jams his bat down on it to block it back to the bowler
Starc to Bopara, no run slower short ball, and Buttler is too early into his pull, can't connect
Starc to Bopara, no run in the blockhole just outside off. Bopara pushes and misses
Starc to Bopara, 2 runs full outside leg, clipped away towards fine leg
Starc to Bopara, no run bouncer, and Bopara clearly wasn't expecting that. He is in a position from where he can only duck under it. Excellent end to an excellent over.
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run full outside off, angling away, sliced in the air, on the bounce to sweeper cover
Faulkner to Bopara, 1 leg bye full, follows Bopara who's looking to step away and make room. Misses the flick and it bounces off his front pad towards backward square leg
Faulkner to Buttler, no run back of a length on leg stump, extra bounce into the hip region. Buttler can only tuck it down into the leg side
Faulkner to Buttler, no run fullish slower ball outside off. Buttler's feet are frozen, and he plays and misses
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 wide another slower ball, wider outside off this time, was very close to the tramline, and the umpire judges it to be a wide
Faulkner to Buttler, 2 runs full on leg stump, clipped away to the left of deep midwicket
Faulkner to Buttler, 2 runs slower ball on middle and leg, tucked away into the leg side, where there are no fielders in the circle
Starc to Bopara, no run short slower ball, rising over off stump. Bopara looks to pull, is into his shot too early, edges it into the off side
Starc to Bopara, 1 wide full and wide outside off. Bopara reaches out to slap it, can't connect.
Starc to Bopara, 1 run middle-stump yorker, whipped away towards midwicket
Starc to Buttler, no run now he bowls a back-of-a-length offcutter on off stump, eaves Buttler and beats him as he pokes at it with no footwork
Starc to Buttler, 2 runs short ball now, and he pulls it away towards deep square leg
Starc to Buttler, 2 runs full on off stump. Buttler goes over the top, slices it over mid-off, doesn't time it at all. The fielder can run back and cut it off well short of the boundary
Starc to Buttler, 1 leg bye slower ball outside leg, follows Buttler who had stepped away from his stumps. Hits his foot and bounces away towards point
Faulkner to Buttler, no run full, sliding away outside off. Buttler aims a reverse-sweep at it and misses
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run down the track now, Faulkner shortens his length and bowls the slower ball. Pulled away towards deep midwicket
Faulkner to Bopara, 1 run shortish on off stump, pulled to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run full-toss on middle and off, slapped to mid-off
Faulkner to Bopara, 1 wide full and wide, another slower ball. Root swings and misses, and it's close enough to the tramline for the umpire to signal wide
Faulkner to Bopara, 1 run yorker on middle and off, clipped away to the right of mid-on
Faulkner to Buttler, FOUR runs full-toss on off stump, and finally a boundary. Clears his front leg and smacks it back down the ground, over the ducking umpire to bring up England's 300
Starc to Bopara, no run in the blockhole on off stump, and all Bopara can do is jab it back to the bowler

Starc to Bopara, 1 run Bopara's standing deep in his crease and he bowls it very full once again, on off stump, and he swipes it away towards mid-on and sets off for a single. Would have been run out if Smith's throw had hit the stumps at the bowler's end
Starc to Buttler, 1 run low full-toss on middle stump, poked away towards mid-off

Starc to Bopara, OUT bowled him. Bopara had taken guard outside off stump, exposing all of his stumps, and Starc bowled him around the legs, clattering the base of leg stump with a low full-toss that swung from outside leg

Starc to Woakes, OUT another, and it's a run out this time. Length ball, swinging away from off stump. Woakes swings and misses and they try to sneak a bye. Haddin's throw knocks back middle stump, and Buttler is short of his crease despite putting in the dive

Starc to Broad, OUT and that's another run-out, is it? Yup, and Australia have a team hat-trick to finish the innings. Broad makes room and Starc spears in another yorker, just outside off. For some reason, Broad didn't even attempt a shot and they looked for another bye. Haddin rolled it into the base of the stumps, and Woakes was well short of his crease.

6.00pm England were 244 for 2 at the end of the 40th over. Bell looked on course for a double century. But Sandhu's double strike in the 42nd over stalled their momentum, and Starc and Faulkner followed that up with some brilliant death bowling. Only 59 came off the last 10 overs, only 27 off the last five, and Australia are in with a real chance of winning this. It's still a 300-plus target, though,

Here's some reading material between innings: When he was a young and ferocious fast bowler, Len Pascoe wanted the batsmen to be afraid of him. But he also had his own fear. That he would hit someone too badly.
Broad to Finch, no run back of a length outside off, punched back to the bowler
Broad to Finch, 2 runs short and wide and Finch slaps it away to the left of Root at sweeper cover
Broad to Finch, 2 runs fullish, a bit of swing in towards middle stump. Finch clips it away towards deep backward square leg
Broad to Finch, 1 run full outside off, driven to mid-off

Broad to Marsh, 1 run lovely delivery, he's suddenly getting some swing here. Pitches leg and moves towards off. Marsh looks to work it leg side and he closes his bat face. It hits the back of his bat and then the back pad, runs away towards third man
Broad to Finch, 1 run full on the pads, flicked away to deep square leg
Ali to Finch, 1 run tossed up full on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
Ali to Marsh, no run tossed up, a bit of drift in towards middle stump, and he punches it back to the bowler
Ali to Marsh, 1 run angled in towards middle stump again, pushed to mid-on. That seemed to go with the angle
Ali to Smith, no run down the track first ball, no surprises there, and he punches it firmly back to the bowler
Ali to Smith, 1 run down the track again, gets closer to the pitch of the ball, whips it to long-on
Broad to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, hops back and across to defend
Broad to Smith, 1 run back of a length again, a bit more width, punched to deep cover
Broad to Marsh, no run full outside off, and Taylor dives to his left at short cover to cut off that drive from Marsh
Broad to Marsh, no run length ball outside off and he comes forward and dabs it with the angle to backward point
Broad to Marsh, 1 run back of a length on leg stump, a bit of extra bounce, and Marsh looks to tuck it off his hips and ends up dropping his bottom hand and fending it away towards square leg
Broad to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, Smith shuffles across to defend to mid-off
Ali to Marsh, 1 run tossed up, angling in towards leg stump, driven down to long-on
Ali to Smith, 1 run fired in flat towards off and middle, driven down to long-on
Ali to Marsh, 1 leg bye tossed up slow, angling down the leg side. Marsh misses the flick, and it runs off his pad towards square leg
Ali to Smith, 1 run full, angled in towards middle stump, whipped away to deep midwicket
Ali to Marsh, 1 run full on middle stump, and Marsh gets his front pad out of the way to drive to long-on
Ali to Smith, 1 run back of a length outside off, turning in marginally towards off stump. Smith punches it to long-on
Finn to Smith, no run full on off stump, clipped to mid-on
Finn to Smith, FOUR runs full on off stump, a bit of shape in, and Smith shows the full face to drive it between the stumps and the diving mid-on fielder
Finn to Smith, no run shortish, rising ball that comes in to cramp Smith for room. He jumps to ride the bounce and drop the ball down towards point
Finn to Smith, no run full now, some shape in towards off stump. Smith defends down the pitch
Finn to Smith, 1 run swings in towards the pads, clipped away towards deep midwicket
Finn to Marsh, no run full, angling across towards off stump, Marsh plays a checked drive to mid-off
Ali to Smith, no run full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
Ali to Smith, no run tossed up outside off, and Smith whips it with a lot of bottom hand to square leg
Ali to Smith, no run length ball on off stump, punched down the ground, intercepted by Taylor at short midwicket
Ali to Smith, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven to long-off
Ali to Marsh, no run loopy delivery on off stump, defended towards mid-off
Ali to Marsh, 1 run a bit of drift in towards middle stump, quite full, clipped to long-on
Finn to White, no run what a ball! That was angled in, towards a fourth-stump line, and it left White off the pitch. He poked at it without too much footwork and the ball beat his outside edge
Finn to Maxwell, no run back of a length outside off. Maxwell leaves it alone, lifting his bat ostentatiously over his head
Finn to Maxwell, 2 runs full inswinger, and Maxwell stands still and clips it in the air towards deep midwicket

Finn to Maxwell, 1 run dropped! Full and swinging in again, and Maxwell flicks uppishly, to the left of Anderson at short midwicket. It went quickly, and he dived full length and got his hand to it but couldn't hold on. Tough chance, that.
Ali to Maxwell, 1 wide full and quick, angles this too far down the leg side
Ali to Maxwell, 1 run full on middle stump, clipped down to long-on
Ali to Smith, 1 run down the track now, driven down to long-on
Ali to Maxwell, 1 run tossed up outside off. Maxwell comes forward to whip it to long-on
Ali to Smith, FOUR runs short, just a bit of width, and Smith makes additional room to cut it away precisely to the point boundary
Ali to Smith, 1 run a bit more air this time and he whips it from outside off down to long-on
Ali to Maxwell, 1 run tossed up on off stump, clipped to long-on
Finn to Maxwell, no run back of a length on off stump, defended towards point
Finn to Maxwell, FOUR runs short and wide, and that's a spectacular-looking shot from Maxwell, stands tall, slices under the ball and sends it screaming away into the gap between point and cover
Finn to Maxwell, 2 runs length ball, closer to off stump. Maxwell comes forward and caresses it to the right of the short cover fielder
Finn to Maxwell, no run back of a length on off stump, defended solidly to mid-off
Finn to Maxwell, no run shortish, doesn't bounce as much as expected. He swivels to pull and toe-ends it, dribbles away into the on side
Finn to Maxwell, no run length ball outside off, defended to mid-off
Ali to Smith, 1 run length ball on off stump, whipped away to the right of deep midwicket
Ali to Maxwell, 1 run tossed up outside off, clipped towards long-on
Ali to Smith, 1 run goes back to a length ball turning towards middle stump, and uses his wrists to poke that away towards long-on
Ali to Maxwell, 1 run a bit of air now and he comes forward to drive to long-on
Ali to Smith, FOUR runs a touch short and Smith rocks back in a flash to cut it away to the point boundary. His judgment of length is terrific, and he picked the gap clinically to the right of point
Ali to Smith, 1 run length ball on off stump, whipped away to deep midwicket
Finn to Smith, 2 runs full, on middle stump. Smith shuffles across to whip that towards deep backward square leg
Finn to Smith, 1 run full on off stump, walks across to clip it towards deep square leg
Finn to Maxwell, 1 run shortish, rising to hip height, and Maxwell moves across to pull that away to deep backward square leg
Finn to Smith, 1 run back of a length on off stump, and he moves across to whip it wide of short midwicket
Finn to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length outside off, and Maxwell dabs it to third man, does it in much wristier fashion than Ian Bell
Finn to Smith, 2 runs fullish, angled in towards middle stump, clipped away towards deep midwicket
Bopara to Maxwell, FOUR runs full and wide, and Maxwell comes forward and opens his bat face to steer it through the vacant slip region. Very deliberately done
Bopara to Maxwell, no run looks to repeat the shot, but it isn't as full as the previous ball and it beats his outside edge
Bopara to Maxwell, 1 run angled in towards the pads, clipped away to deep square leg
Bopara to Smith, 1 run full outside off, whipped to long-on
Bopara to Maxwell, FOUR runs full on leg stump, and Maxwell tickles it away to the right of the short fine leg fielder
Bopara to Maxwell, 1 run length ball on off stump, Maxwell plays a checked drive to sweeper cover
Finn to Maxwell, no run fullish outside off, driven on the up to short cover
Finn to Maxwell, no run length ball outside off, and it straightens to beat Maxwell, who pokes at it with an open face
Finn to Maxwell, no run length ball on a fourth stump line, defended towards point
Finn to Maxwell, no run length ball on off stump, defended to short cover
Finn to Maxwell, no run back of a length on off stump, gets up on his toes to dab it to the left of short cover
Finn to Maxwell, 1 run full outside off, and he drives firmly but too close to short cover, who dives to his right to stop it
Woakes to Maxwell, 1 run length ball on off stump, driven to sweeper cover
Woakes to Smith, no run full outside off, and Smith shuffles across to whip it to mid-on
Woakes to Smith, 1 run full and wide, driven to sweeper cover
Woakes to Maxwell, 1 run short on off stump, pulled down to deep square leg
Woakes to Smith, 1 run full outside off, a bit of shape away. Smith reaches out and drives to sweeper cover
Woakes to Maxwell, no run full on a fourth-stump line, driven to mid-off
Ali to Smith, 1 run down the track, checked drive to long-on
Ali to Maxwell, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, clipped to deep midwicket
Ali to Smith, 1 run gives it some air again outside off, and he whips this to long-on for another easy single
Ali to Maxwell, 1 run length ball, turns in towards middle stump, and he flicks it to the right of short midwicket for a quick single
Ali to Smith, 1 run tossed up high and slow on middle stump, driven to long-on
Ali to Maxwell, no run tossed up a little wider outside off, and he goes hard at the drive and hits it straight back to the bowler
Woakes to Smith, 1 run back of a length, a bit of outswing outside off, and he shuffles across to dab it towards backward point
Woakes to Maxwell, 1 run length ball outside off, steered to the right of third man
Woakes to Smith, 1 run fullish outside off, Smith gets forward to drive to sweeper cover

Woakes to Maxwell, FOUR runs shortish ball, and that's a superb shot, stepped outside the line and swung his body weight through his hips to half pull and half whip it to the deep backward square leg boundary
Woakes to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed away to third man
Woakes to Smith, 1 run and again, this time it's Smith who picks up a dabbed single to third man
Ali to Smith, 2 runs short ball, pulled away to the left of the long leg fielder
Ali to Smith, 1 run tossed up on off stump, whipped away to long-on
Ali to Maxwell, no run a bit quicker and flatter on off stump, and Maxwell presses forward but can't get to the pitch, clips it carefully to short midwicket
Ali to Faulkner, no run goes back to a length ball on off stump, tucks it away to short midwicket
Ali to Faulkner, 1 run full on middle stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
Broad to Faulkner, no run length ball outside off, angling in, left alone
Broad to Faulkner, no run length ball wide outside off, and Faulkner leaves again
Broad to Faulkner, no run full on off stump, blocked into the covers
Broad to Faulkner, no run full outside off, driven to mid-off
Broad to Faulkner, FOUR runs a bit more width this time and he presses forward and drives into the gap between short cover and mid-off
Broad to Faulkner, 1 run length ball on off stump, and he comes forward and dabs it to third man with dexterous hands
Ali to Faulkner, no run full on off stump, defended with a turn of the wrists into the leg side
Ali to Faulkner, no run length ball on off stump, and he goes on the back foot to defend into the on side
Ali to Faulkner, no run fuller now and quicker, and Faulkner is hurried into a defensive clip to short midwicket
Ali to Faulkner, no run tossed up outside off, whipped to short midwicket
Ali to Faulkner, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched down to long-on
Ali to Smith, 1 run tossed up outside off and Smith takes a big step down the pitch to drive to long-on
Broad to Smith, 1 run in the blockhole on middle stump, clipped away towards deep square leg
Broad to Faulkner, no run length ball outside off, a bit of movement away, and Faulkner pokes and misses
Broad to Faulkner, no run on the pads, clipped away into the on side
Broad to Faulkner, no run length ball on middle and off, defended into the covers. Smith ran out of his crease, and would have been out by a long way had Taylor's throw hit the stumps
Broad to Faulkner, no run back of a length outside off, left alone
Broad to Faulkner, 1 run full on the pads, clipped away to deep square leg
Ali to Faulkner, FOUR runs drags this down short and Faulkner pulls it away powerfully to the midwicket boundary
Ali to Faulkner, 1 run tossed up outside off, and he stretches out to play a checked drive to long-off
Ali to Smith, no run back of a length on off stump, punched to straight midwicket
Ali to Smith, no run down the track now and he bowls it a touch wider. Smith drives it firmly, straight back to the bowler
Ali to Smith, no run very full on off stump, driven back to the bowler again
Ali to Smith, no run tossed up outside off, and again he can only drive it straight back to Moeen
Finn to Faulkner, no run back of a length on off stump, straightens a touch, and Faulkner defends from the crease
Finn to Faulkner, 3 runs full on off stump and he shows the full face to drive that between the stumps and mid-off
Finn to Smith, 1 run back of a length on a fifth-stump line, and Smith shuffles across to work it into the leg side
Finn to Faulkner, 1 run on the pads, clipped away to the left of deep backward square leg
Finn to Smith, 1 run back of a length outside off, and that's the first false shot from Smith, goes hard at it with an angled bat, looking to punch through cover, and inside-edges it past the stumps
Finn to Faulkner, FOUR runs full and wide and that's a cracking drive to the left of mid-off. Leans over the ball and punches through the line
Ali to Smith, 2 runs flat, angled down the leg side and he whips it away to long leg
Ali to Smith, 1 run down the track, driven to long-on
Ali to Faulkner, 1 run shortish, angling down leg, pulled away to long leg
Ali to Smith, 1 run down the track once again, and Smith moves to fifty, appropriately, with another single down to long-on
Ali to Faulkner, no run back of a length on off stump, punched back to the bowler
Ali to Faulkner, no run length ball outside off, punched to cover point
Finn to Smith, 1 run back of a length outside off and he shuffles across to work it towards deep square leg
Finn to Faulkner, 1 run back of a length on off stump, dabbed away to the left of backward point
Finn to Smith, 2 runs back of a length outside off, steered with an open face to the left of third man
Finn to Smith, 1 run how does he do this so nonchalantly? It's a fifth-stump ball, and he simply shuffles across and whips it away into the leg side, wide of the man at short midwicket
Finn to Faulkner, no run sees Faulkner making room and bowls a slower ball outside off. The batsman goes for a drive, off-balance, and misses
Finn to Faulkner, 1 run length ball on off stump, dabbed down to third man
Anderson to Faulkner, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump, defended watchfully to mid-off
Anderson to Faulkner, 1 run back of a length on middle stump, whipped away to deep midwicket
Anderson to Smith, no run back of a length, angling in, defended into the on side
Anderson to Smith, 1 run full outside off, whipped to long-on
Anderson to Faulkner, 2 runs on the pads now and Faulkner works it away towards deep square leg
Anderson to Faulkner, no run inswinging yorker on leg stump, and he quickly gets his foot out of the way to jab it towards short midwicket
Woakes to Smith, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed away to the right of backward point
Woakes to Faulkner, no run length ball on middle and off, defended back to the bowler. That straightened ever so slightly
Woakes to Faulkner, 1 run full on middle stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
Woakes to Smith, 1 run length ball on middle and off, and Smith works it away to deep midwicket
Woakes to Faulkner, FOUR runs down the leg side now and all Faulkner needs is a tickle and he gets that to send it flying wide of the diving Buttler behind the stumps
Woakes to Faulkner, 1 run length ball outside off, pushed with soft hands to the right of backward point
Anderson to Faulkner, no run length ball on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
Anderson to Faulkner, 1 run back of a length on off stump, defended with soft hands to the left of short cover
Anderson to Smith, 1 run on the pads, Smith flicks it away to deep midwicket
Anderson to Faulkner, 1 run back of a length now, tucked off the hips towards deep square leg
Anderson to Smith, FOUR runs full on the pads, terrible delivery, and Smith flicks it up and over, wide of short fine leg, to the backward square leg boundary
Anderson to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
Woakes to Faulkner, no run length ball on middle and leg, tucked away to short midwicket
Woakes to Haddin, no run back of a length outside off, defended towards point
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run back of a length outside off, Haddin is off the mark with a dab to third man
Woakes to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, shuffles across and works it to short midwicket

Woakes to Smith, 3 runs angled in towards middle stump and he shuffles across to tuck it away towards the square leg boundary. Anderson comes around from deep midwicket and cuts it off with a dive inches from the rope
Anderson to Smith, FOUR runs back of a length outside off, and Smith plays the best shot of his innings, standing tall and punching into the gap between point and cover
Anderson to Smith, no run back of a length again, and this time Smith opens his bat face a touch too early and the inside edge rolls back towards the bowler
Anderson to Smith, 2 runs full outside off, and now they have a fielder at sweeper cover to cut off the square drive
Anderson to Smith, no run length ball outside off, a bit of movement in off the pitch. Smith comes forward and defends back to the bowler
Anderson to Smith, 1 run angled into the pads, clipped to the right of mid-on
Anderson to Haddin, no run length ball on off stump, blocked to short extra cover
Woakes to Smith, 1 run full and wide, driven to sweeper cover
Woakes to Haddin, no run back of a length outside off, dabbed to backward point
Woakes to Haddin, no run length ball on middle and leg. Haddin stays on the back foot, stays inside the line, pushes it back to the bowler
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run down the track comes Haddin, looking for the big hit over cover, and the thick edge flies uppishly towards third man
Woakes to Smith, 1 run shortish outside off, pulled away to deep midwicket
Woakes to Haddin, no run full on middle stump, driven firmly to mid-off
Finn to Smith, 1 run starts the spell with a short ball that Smith muscles from outside off down to deep square leg
Finn to Haddin, 3 runs that's a favourite shot of Haddin's. Steps down the track and launches it over mid-off. Doesn't quite middle it, and it stops well short of the boundary
Finn to Smith, no run back of a length, rising ball on off stump, and he gets on his toes to ride the bounce and play it down towards point
Finn to Smith, 1 run length ball outside off and he shuffles a long way across to work it to long leg
Finn to Haddin, 1 run short ball, sits up, and he pulls it away to deep square leg

Finn to Smith, 3 runs length ball, angling in towards middle stump. Smith makes it look like a bad ball by shuffling across and glancing towards the fine leg boundary, but if he missed that, it was a sure lbw. Thing is, he simply doesn't miss, does he? He stays upright and makes sure his head isn't falling over
Broad to Smith, no run fullish outside off, and Smith pokes it away towards backward point

Broad to Smith, FOUR runs short and very wide, and Smith slaps it away contemptuously to the point boundary. Did very well to reach out and get on top of the bounce. HotSpot says it went off the toe end of his bat
Broad to Smith, 2 runs back of a length outside off and there's that big shuffle and the little tuck towards deep backward square leg
Broad to Smith, no run full outside off, sliced to backward point
Broad to Smith, 1 run full on off stump, angling in. Smith clips it towards long-on
Broad to Haddin, no run sees Haddin making room and follows him with a leg-stump yorker. Pushed firmly back to the bowler
Finn to Smith, 1 run short and wide, slapped away to sweeper cover
Finn to Haddin, no run slower ball outside off. Haddin slogs and misses
Finn to Haddin, 3 runs length ball outside off, swiped away towards the wide long-on boundary. Root sprints around from deep midwicket to cut it off
Finn to Smith, no run short and wide and Smith admonishes himself after missing the cut. That moved away a touch after pitching
Finn to Smith, no run short and wide once more, and it's punched firmly but Bell stops it with a dive to his right from backward point
Finn to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, whipped to mid-on
Broad to Haddin, FOUR runs back of a length on off stump and Haddin steps away from the line and opens his bat face to steer it between the keeper and short third man. Cheeky and brilliantly executed
Broad to Haddin, no run yorker on leg stump, follows Haddin, who jams his bat down to poke that to short midwicket

Broad to Haddin, FOUR runs full-toss wide outside off and Haddin picks up another boundary, slicing under the ball to lift that over the backward point fielder. A fairly rotund spectator dives over the boundary hoarding and falls into the playing area in a doomed attempt at fielding the ball
Broad to Haddin, no run length ball on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
Broad to Haddin, 1 run full-toss outside off, and he skips across to whip it to deep square leg
Broad to Smith, no run full on off stump, clipped to short midwicket
Finn to Haddin, 1 run full and wide, driven to sweeper cover
Finn to Smith, 1 run shortish and wide, slapped away airily to the left of sweeper cover

Finn to Haddin, SIX runs length ball outside off, and Haddin clears his front leg to launch that back over the bowler's head, sends it soaring high over the boundary, and a spectator drops a simple catch two rows back
Finn to Haddin, FOUR runs a little fuller, and Haddin takes a step back into his crease to manufacture hitting room, and launches it into the long-on boundary, one bounce

Finn to Haddin, 1 run back of a length, follows Haddin who backs away, and he dabs it into the off side for a quick single. Did well to keep that down, because that got a bit big on him and hit his glove
Finn to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, keeps low and sneaks under Smith's bat as he looks to force it away through the off side
Broad to Haddin, 1 run slower ball outside off, and Haddin lets it come on and dabs it to short third man
Broad to Smith, 1 run full outside off, and he opens his face to drive that to deep point
Broad to Haddin, FOUR runs full on middle and off and he takes a step back and across and clears room to play the pick-up shot over backward square leg
Broad to Haddin, 3 runs full outside off, and he eases the drive to the right of the man at sweeper cover
Broad to Smith, 1 run back of a length outside off, and he shuffles across to work it to deep square leg
Broad to Haddin, 1 run full-toss on off stump, punched back past the bowler, down to long-off

Anderson to Haddin, 2 runs full on off stump and Haddin steps away from the line and extends his arms to loft that high over mid-off. Doesn't get the desired distance and Finn chases back a long way to try and get under it but the ball drops a safe distance away from him
Anderson to Haddin, 1 run shortish slower ball and Haddin swats it away towards deep midwicket

Anderson to Smith, SIX runs Taken! Finally someone in the crowd shows some sort of fielding skills, after a rebound off his friend's palms, no less. It was a length ball outside off and Smith sent that soaring over long-on
Anderson to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, punched into the covers
Anderson to Smith, 2 runs slower ball, short ball, pulled round to deep square leg
Anderson to Smith, 1 run short, down the leg side, and he swivels around to pull it to long leg
Woakes to Smith, 1 run short ball, pulled down to deep backward square leg, and Smith has a century on captaincy debut in ODIs to go with his century on captaincy debut in Tests. What a player he is.
Woakes to Haddin, no run slower ball outside off, and Haddin is beaten, through his pull shot too early
Woakes to Haddin, 1 wide Woakes throws a bit of a spanner into Haddin's fifty plans, spearing a wide down the leg side
Woakes to Smith, 1 run angles this into the pads, and Smith flicks it away to deep square leg
Woakes to Henriques, no run back of a length on middle stump, tucked away towards short midwicket
Woakes to Henriques, 1 run full on off stump, and he almost manages to split short cover and mid-off with the drive. Mid-off sprawls full-length to his left to stop the ball
Anderson to Henriques, no run full outside off, defended to short cover
Anderson to Henriques, no run full on off stump, and he flows into a good-looking drive straight to short cover
Anderson to Henriques, no run back of a length outside off, defended solidly off the back foot
Anderson to Henriques, 2 runs full on middle and leg, clipped away towards deep midwicket, and that's Australia's 300
Anderson to Henriques, no run sees Henriques backing away and follows him, looks to flick but can't connect, is hit on the pad
Anderson to Henriques, 1 run full on middle stump and Henriques shows the full face to drive to long-on
Woakes to Henriques, no run length ball on off stump, pushed to short cover

Woakes to Henriques, no run down the track now and Woakes yorks Henriques, who can't get that drive past short cover. Smith was out of his crease at the other end and an accurate throw would have had him out
Woakes to Smith, 1 run full outside off and he shuffles across to flick it to deep midwicket and level the scores
Woakes to Starc, 1 run length ball on middle stump and he makes room to slap it away through the off side. Bounces over the fielder at cover, and that's the winning hit

10.13pm A bit of tension at the end, but how well did Smith control that chase? He made an exceptional century in a high-pressure chase against South Africa not too long ago, and this innings was just as good, if not better. Good support from Maxwell, Faulkner and Haddin as well. But England really lost the match when they were batting, in the last 10 overs of their innings. Ian Bell will wonder how

10.30pm That's all from us, from this highly entertaining game in Hobart. Australia have three wins out of three now, which means they are through to the final. England's defeat gives India a window of hope of reaching the final themselves. Make sure you join us for the next game, whenever that is (I'm pretty bad with itineraries). Until then, ta ta!
Australia won by 3 wickets (with 1 ball remaining)
Player of the match is Steven Smith, AUS
